thread.title: Independent Marketing Agency Blue Chip Names Two to its Executive Leadership

author: cnbc.com
title: Independent Marketing Agency Blue Chip Names Two to its Executive Leadership

organizations.name: independent marketing agency blue chip names two

text:
Ad industry vet Larry Deutsch named agency’s chief growth officer, Jamie Olson promoted to senior vice president of business leadership
NORTHBROOK, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Integrated marketing agency Blue Chip has named industry veteran Larry Deutsch to its newly created position of chief growth officer .
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180308006026/en/
Industry vet Larry Deutsch has been named Chief Growth Officer of independent marketing agency Blue Chip. (Photo: Business Wire)
Deutsch has been at Blue Chip since 2012, serving as executive vice president and general manager of its business leadership team. Deutsch was responsible for uniting the agency’s brand and retail marketing capabilities, while also overseeing business development for the agency. In his new role, Deutsch will be responsible for driving the agency’s growth by aligning with new and existing client business challenges. As independently held Blue Chip focuses elevating its own brand visibility within the industry, Deutsch will also be responsible for marketing the agency.
In addition, Blue Chip named Jamie Olson its senior vice president of business leadership . Olson is a twelve-year veteran of Blue Chip, and has served multiple executive leadership roles, while also playing an integral role in business development for the agency. In her new role, Olson will oversee the multiple brand account teams.
Both Deutsch and Olson are credited with helping Blue Chip to win key accounts, including Daisy Brand, B&G Foods, Brown-Forman, McCormick & Co., Inc., and HARIBO.
“Larry and Jamie represent the future of Blue Chip’s strategic growth and client leadership,” said Stanton Kawer, Blue Chip chairman and CEO. “We are honored to have their depth of industry talent and expertise to create sustainable growth for Blue Chip and our client partners.”
Prior to Blue Chip, Deutsch held leadership roles at Ogilvy, Wunderman and Havas, as well as brand marketing and new product development at Kraft Foods and Wrigley. Olson came to Blue Chip in 2006 from FCB.
About Blue Chip Marketing Worldwide
Blue Chip ( http://www.bluechipww.com ) is an independent, united marketing agency. Named to the Crain’s Chicago Business’ Fast Fifty for five consecutive years (from 2010 to 2015) and then again 2017, Blue Chip delivers transformational growth for high-profile clients such as Procter & Gamble, McCormick & Co., Inc., HARIBO, Brown-Forman, Daisy Brand and Fisher Nuts through the creation and execution of innovative, multi-platform marketing campaigns.
